title: Drawing, "Mountainous Landscape", 1853
markings:
Watermark:  Parts of a K and another letter.  Similar to 1917-4-104.
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457c
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457e
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite, at top left: 3; again, at top right: yellow (cream) stucco
             on brick; and at bottom right: Hospital de San Jaun de Dios - Honda/ 2
             Caucho Tree roots trailing to the ground / top cut off.

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite, at center: 3
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view of a one story windowed building with the ruins of a church               attached to its left side among hills and parts of other ruins visible in the                   right foreground and left background. 

Verso:  Horizontal mountainous landscape sketch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountainous Landscape", 1853.
1853. Graphite on light gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-96-b.
